overview_of_class: Form, Structure, and Compression in the Short Story: time in this course will be divided between workshopping student stories and discussing published pieces, with a particular interest in what form stories take, how they build structure, and the use of compression and style to achieve depth. Students will write two short stories and revise one of them for a final project. Texts will include Denis Johnson, Flannery O'Connor, David Foster Wallace, and Best American Short Stories 2014. The course is for students who have taken courses in fiction or who have ficton writing experience.
name: Advanced Reading and Writing Fiction I
subject: ENGLISH
